title: How to create my own article spinner - Quora

response.answer_text: Why don’t you just get one article spinner? A great article spinner that not only shows you how to effectively spin your articles, but also give you great content that can't be found anywhere. Spinner Chief is the best article spinner that creates unique articles that pass on copyscape, because it can rewrite the most unique and human readable articles, because the Super Spin function can rewrite unique articles to 78% unique - 86%unique. It also has a Web Api that allows spinning from the web, it is the only article spinnerthat has both a desktop and a web version! You can not only use it to spin words, sentences, paragraphs and articles, but also can batch spin articles, this batch spin function is very powerful that can spin all the articles in any selected directory with only one click!
